channel.title: Item.cfg
channel.description:
Cant add korasi because some error, the error removes if i remove that one from my item.cfg code in cfg:
item = 8002 Korasi`s sword The sword of a void knight. 230 230 230 41 57 -4 0 0 13 26 7 0 0 56 0
error code: DeltaScape Server. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:112)
PLZ HELP :eek:

item.title: Item.cfg
item.dc:creator: @zamorak_lord zamorak lord
item.description:
@zamorak_lord wrote:

I have done with _ but does not work either

Read full topic

item.title: Item.cfg
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

Awesome I was right

Read full topic

item.title: Item.cfg
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“jmk600, post:3, topic:394175”]I think you have to put underscores?

Idk if that would help it or not.[/quote]

Yes, because of the (poor) way the item data is loaded, spaces/tabs are only used between different data types. The name and description must use underscores.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:

Idk if that would help it or not.

item.title: Item.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

Think you have too change the out of bounds exception, like it’ll stop loading items after a certain ID, but you can change that… It looks like it’s in your main.java, but I never experienced this problem so hope I atleast helped :rolleyes: .

Read full topic
